keyMoments.title: Miss Goldenweek Demonstrates Strategic Value
keyMoments.description: Miss Goldenweek proves her worth to Baroque Works by completely neutralizing Luffy using her Colors Trap ability.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Baroque Works values tactical and psychological warfare, not just brute force.

keyMoments.title: Nearly Eliminates Multiple Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works agents nearly succeed in killing Zoro, Nami, and Vivi simultaneously while keeping Luffy incapacitated.
keyMoments.significance: Closest Baroque Works has come to eliminating the Straw Hat Pirates during the Little Garden arc.

description: A secret criminal organization operating in the Grand Line, using code names and a hierarchical structure. Officer Agents are pursuing the Straw Hat Pirates on Little Garden.
